alert.note: Alert for Lake (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 12 at 1:07PM CDT until October 12 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LAKE COUNTY... At 106 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Racine to Winthrop Harbor to near Gurnee to near Mundelein, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Locally 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waukegan, North Chicago, Gurnee, Mundelein, Zion, Grayslake, Libertyville, Lake Forest, Lindenhurst, Beach Park, Gages Lake, Park City, Round Lake Park, Winthrop Harbor, Lake Bluff, Grandwood Park, Green Oaks, Wadsworth, Venetian Village and Third Lake. This includes... College of Lake County, Great Lakes Naval Training Center, Lake County Fielders Baseball, Lake County IL Fairgrounds, Lake Forest College, and Six Flags Great America. Including the following interstates... I-94 between mile markers 1 and 16. I-294 between mile markers 1 and 16. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
